message.body: There are only lights on in half the room. Is there a way to turn the other lights on?

The musicians probably unscrewed the bulbs, or they burnt out. There should be a ladder near the shuffle board tables...extra bulbs in either the gray shelf near the green table, or in clip lights in Tupperware on big work table....sorry :-(
There are also smaller lamps around you can plug in. White Ikea lamp on our shelf, lamp on computer table, and one on the tall musician shelf.
Thanks. That's super helpful.
Sorry, the musicians are vampires, I forgot they keep it dim in there if we don't stop them
It's cool. Sounds like an easy fix.
Running a few minutes behind.
K
Just found out that we'll be ending early at 4:30 if want to come sooner. I can stay til 5 if not.
Ok, I can do that
Cool.
Running a few late
It's cool. No rush.
Hey. Just found out about some actor conflicts for today, so we'll be ending around 4 instead.
K
You can have the box! Sorry it took me so long to get back to you. How can I get it to you?
That's awesome. Becky and I will be back in Philly on Tuesday and part of Wednesday. I'm sure one of us can pick it up.
Great. I'll be at the space at 1 on Wednesday if you want to come then!
That might work. I'll let you know.
Sounds good
Is it cool for me to come by tomorrow at 1 to pick up the box?
Can you get there just a few minutes before 1? But, yes!
Whenever you need. Sure!
I would have to take a bus at 2pm
? I fear you may have accidentally sent me a missive meant for someone else....
I did... And I thought I stopped it before it sent but I guess not :-(
Ha, no worries, just wanted to make sure it ended up in the right hands!
On your way?
